ANACOM does not collect retail tariffs on IMR, because in packages it is not possible to isolate prices/revenues relative to intra-EU roaming. However, ANACOM collects data relative to roaming traffic intra-EU. To note also that ANACOM collects prices of domestic offers (which includes roaming). Yet, it is not possible to allocate the price relative to roaming.

note: ANACOM does not collect retail tariffs on IMR, because in packages it is not possible to isolate prices/revenues relative to intra-EU roaming. However, ANACOM collects data relative to roaming traffic intra-EU. To note also that ANACOM collects prices of domestic offers (which includes roaming). Yet, it is not possible to allocate the price relative to roaming. However, it is possible to calculate the average price for voice, sms and data for the Rest of the World, based on revenues and traffic
